page.title: 15THE M5 THROUGH LOXTON
page.content: THE M5 MOTORWAY CUTS THROUGH THE GENTLE SOMERSET COUNTRYSIDE OF THIS BLOCK. ENTERING,FROM THE NORTH,THE DRIVER,COMING SOUTH,HAS A GREAT DEAL OF BEAUTIFUL SCENERY TO DISTRACT HIM FROM HIS DRIVING. TO THE EAST THE VALLEY GIVES WAY TO THE RISING TOP OF CROOKS PEAK WHILE TO THE WEST,THE VALLEY FLOOR GIVES WAY TO THE PARTIALLY WOODED SLOPES OF LOXTON HILL. EMERGING FROM THE VALLEY,THE MOTORWAY STETCHES ACROSS THE SOMERSET LEVELS.IN THE FOREGROUND IS THE HILL OF BRENT KNOLL TOPPED WITH ITS IRON AGED FORT AND PROMISING A HAVEN FOR THE WEARY IN ITS REST AREA. TO LOCAL PEOPLE,THE M5 PROVIDES READY ACCESS TO THE BRITISH COUNTRYSIDE.THIS ADVANTAGE BEING OFFSET BY THE ROAR OF THE MOTORWAY TRAFFIC.
